Based on the provided preferences and keywords, I recommend checking out "Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me" (1999). This film is a comedic take on the spy genre with memorable characters such as Austin Powers and his nemesis Dr. Evil. The plot revolves around Austin Powers' quest to regain his mojo after it was stolen by Dr. Evil. The film also features cameos from several famous celebrities including Bruce Willis, Mel Gibson, Tom Cruise, Arnold Schwarzenegger, 50 Cent and many more.
Another recommendation based on the provided preferences is "Bad Moms" (2016). This film is a comedic take on motherhood with memorable characters such as Jen Jenkins and her fellow bad moms. The plot revolves around Jen Jenkins' mission to keep her two children out of trouble and out of their mother's hair. However, things don't always go according to plan, especially when the kids get a little mischievous.
Another recommendation based on the provided preferences is "Captain America: The First Avenger" (2011). This film is an action-packed adventure movie with memorable characters such as Steve Rogers and his fellow Avengers. The plot revolves around Steve Rogers' mission to become a superhero known as Captain America after he was rejected from military service due to his age, lack of training and physical condition. However, things don't always go according to plan, especially when Steve Rogers encounters various obstacles, enemies and villains while pursuing his mission to become Captain America.
